alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 8:49PM PST until January 12 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 4 inches. Snow totals of 6 to 12 inches. e Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low 15 to 25 below zero. * WHERE...Leavenworth and Plain. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 AM PST Friday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
